name: Eldritch Ooze
description: A large, amorphous ooze with a viscous form that seems to shimmer with a psychic energy, capable of fitting through small spaces.
memorable: The ability to reduce Intelligence could lead to instant death, making it a unique threat.
goals: To incapacitate or kill targets within reach, particularly those with higher Intelligence.
environment: Typically found in dark, cold, or damp environments.
strengths: Immunity to acid, cold, lightning, and slashing damage, along with various condition immunities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: The Void-Infused Pseudopod delivers a combination of bludgeoning and psychic damage, with the potential to reduce Intelligence.
most_powerful_ability: Maddening Form imposes incapacitation and psychic damage, affecting creatures with higher Intelligence.
senses: Blindsight 60 ft., but blind beyond that range.
additional_information: Can split when subjected to lightning or slashing damage.
Capable of climbing on ceilings without penalty.
test_queries: amorphous creature that splits when damaged
psychic damage ooze with Intelligence reduction
strange blobby creature residing in dark places
maddening ooze that incapacitates intelligent beings
